fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Outsider: You appear to not win with Order. Affects up to Uncertain checks. 
- Cult: All of your Cult members no longer appear to win with their original faction. You share a faction chat with all of your Cult members. This chat does not close when a member dies.  
- Doomsday: If a faction would normally win, everyone will be alerted that there is a Cult and they must kill members of the Cult. Each member in the cult will then gain 1 non-Special card of their choice.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Recruit: Pick a player. They will be forcefully recruited to your Cult, and are now working for your goal with their original role intact. This ability fails on players with Chaos and Unique roles, and if it fails, you will get your ability charge back. [X uses, 1 CD, Astral, Locks D3] *X = (# players/8 rounded)*
- Preservation: Choose a player that isn’t yourself. If they die from non-Event causes in this phase, they will live on 1 HP instead, with all status effects still applied. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2, Locks D5]
- Offering: Lose 1 HP. Choose a non-Special card to add to your Hand. [Infinite uses, 1 CD]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Recruit members into your Cult and kill everyone else who isn’t in your Cult.
